row.process: ! requires UC4 script variable &UC4RB_CHECKME# ! different UNIX variable are set if the object is a directory, a file or does not exist CHECKME="&UC4RB_CHECKME#" ISDIR=0 ISFILE=0 EXIST=0 if [ -d "$CHECKME" ] ; then ISDIR=1 EXIST=1 else if [ -f "$CHECKME" ] ; then ISFILE=1 EXIST=1 fi fi :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "&UC4RB_CHECKME# is checked for being a dir/file and if it exist" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "ISDIR:$ISDIR ISFILE:$ISFILE EXIST:$EXIST" echo &UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING# &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "------------------------------" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO
